title: How does anthropology (sociological, anthropological, psychological, and philosophical) contribute to the knowledge of man? - Quora

response.answer_text: These academic disciplines answer questions we may have. For example, why do humans become jealous? Psychology can provide insight into this phenomenon: Psychology Today In this way we accumulate knowledge about ourselves so that we can answer the questions of who we are, where did we come from, where are we going, why are we here etc. But the real answers to the most important questions ( e.g. Who am I?) and thus real self-knowledge can only be found or obtained, in my opinion, mystically in following a spiritual path.
